properties.name: fitcheckme.jwt-access-token-validity-s
properties.description: How many seconds the JWT access token will remain valid for

properties.name: fitcheckme.jwt-refresh-token-validity-s
properties.description: How many seconds the JWT refresh token will remain valid for

properties.name: fitcheckme.bcrypt-password-encoder-strength
properties.description: Strength passed to BCryptPasswordEncoder. Higher value means more computationally expensive. Tune until it takes roughly 1 second to verify a password

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-username-length
properties.description: How many characters usernames are allowed

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-email-length
properties.description: How many characters emails are allowed

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-user-bio-length
properties.description: How many characters bios are allowed

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-outfit-name-length
properties.description: How many characters outfit names are allowed

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-outfit-desc-length
properties.description: How many characters outfit descriptions are allowed

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-outfit-tags
properties.description: How many tags outfits are allowed

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-garment-name-length
properties.description: How many characters garment names are allowed

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-urls-per-garment
properties.description: How many URLs garments are allowed

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-garment-url-length
properties.description: How many characters garment URLs are allowed

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-garment-tags
properties.type: java.lang.How many tags garments are allowed

properties.name: fitcheckme.max-garments-per-outfit
properties.description: How many garments outfits are allowed
